prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a playful attitude and a digging ability.
I want a cute Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a unique blue color scheme.
Generate a small, furry Pokemon with large claws that thrives in desert environments.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a mole, with a brown body and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon with a mix of earthy tones and a fun digging feature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure, with a focus on ground exploration.
Show me a Pokemon with a friendly personality, perfect for underground battles.
